scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run start" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install: concurrently "cd server && npm install --force" "cd client && npm install --force"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd server npm start" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "cd server && npx tsc server.ts"
